$OLED Two new videos examine every inch of Apple’s unreleased 2018 iPhone designs. https://bgr.com/2018/08/08/iphone-x-release-date-coming-hands-on-video/ $AAPL $SSNLF

links.title: Two new videos examine every inch of Apple's unreleased 2018 iPhone designs
links.description: We're just one day away from Samsung's big Galaxy Note 9 unveiling, which can only mean one thing... just about everyone's attention has already turned to September, which is when Apple will announce its 2018 iPhone lineup! Calm down, people. That was a joke.

messages.body: $OLED Apple may look beyond Samsung and LG as Sharp enters OLED screen market. https://www.moneycontrol.com/news/technology/apple-may-look-beyond-samsung-and-lg-as-sharp-enters-oled-screen-market-2823291.html $AAPL $LPL $SSNLF

links.title: Apple may look beyond Samsung and LG as Sharp enters OLED screen market
links.description: The OLED screen market has a new entrant - Sharp. The Japanese manufacturing company has entered the domain to develop OLED screens for smartphones. This essentially means competition for Samsung and LG. Apple may be the beneficiary if Sharp manages to carve a niche in the OLED screen market.

https://www.cultofmac.com/568505/use-apple-pencil-with-iphone-dumb-hack/#more-568505

links.title: Use an Apple Pencil with your iPhone with this dumb hack | Cult of Mac
links.description: The Apple Pencil is easily the best stylus for any tablet computer, but thanks to the deep hardware ties that make it work so well with the iPad, it won't work with anything else. Or will it? With this messy hack, you can make your Apple Pencil work with your iPhone.
